// shape, next element value, transform value
// shape is the one of 'initial(0), medial(1), final(2), or isolated(3)'.
{ 0x0622, 0xFEF5, 0xFEF5, 0xFEF6, 0xFEF6 },
{ 0x0623, 0xFEF7, 0xFEF7, 0xFEF8, 0xFEF8 },
{ 0x0625, 0xFEF9, 0xFEF9, 0xFEFA, 0xFEFA },
{ 0x0627, 0xFEFB, 0xFEFB, 0xFEFC, 0xFEFC }
